publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4395 Bill Butler: Partick Thistle’s Play-Off Success—That the Parliament congratulates Partick Thistle Football Club on securing promotion to the First Division via its success in the play-off final on 14 May 2006; commends the commitment and hard work of the players and staff at Firhill; applauds the dedication of the club’s loyal support, and wishes the Jags every success in the forthcoming 2006-07 season. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Janis Hughes*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Jackie Baillie*, Cathy Peattie*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Des McNulty*, Pauline McNeill*, Trish Godman*, Mr David Davidson* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4395 Partick Thistle’s Play-Off Success (lodged on 15 May 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4395 Partick Thistle’s Play-Off Success (lodged on 15 May 2006) Cathie Craigie*, Alex Neil*, Karen Gillon*

S2M-4395 Bill Butler: Partick Thistle’s Play-Off Success—That the Parliament congratulates Partick Thistle Football Club on securing promotion to the First Division via its success in the play-off final on 14 May 2006; commends the commitment and hard work of the players and staff at Firhill; applauds the dedication of the club’s loyal support, and wishes the Jags every success in the forthcoming 2006-07 season. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Janis Hughes, Murdo Fraser, Bill Aitken, Rob Gibson, Eleanor Scott, Jackie Baillie, Cathy Peattie, Mr Charlie Gordon, Des McNulty, Pauline McNeill, Trish Godman, Mr David Davidson, Tommy Sheridan, Maureen Macmillan, Mr Frank McAveety, Ms Sandra White, Cathie Craigie, Alex Neil, Karen Gillon, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4395 Partick Thistle’s Play-Off Success (lodged on 15 May 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4395 Partick Thistle’s Play-Off Success (lodged on 15 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Dr Jean Turner*
